pages.text: $(li)Glass Bottles are basically containers.$(br)$(li)You can fill Glass Bottles with Honey, Water, Lava, and Ink.

$(li)To use a Glass Bottle, just right click pointing the specific liquid while you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.$(br)$(li)Depending of the liquid, you will obtain a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bottle)Water Bottle$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/lava_bottle)Lava Bottle$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/honey_bottle)Honey Bottle$(/l), or Ink Bottle.

$(li)You can trap $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bee)Bees$(/l) with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.

$(li)You can trap $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/silverfish)Silverfish$(/l) with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.

$(li)You can trap $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/endermite)Endermite$(/l) with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.
